Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア
Entry.EnglishText: Curia

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャ
Entry.EnglishText: Misha

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Armor Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ううぅ……隊長……
Entry.EnglishText: Uugh... Commander...

Entry.JapaneseText: しっかりするんだ!! 何があった!?
Entry.EnglishText: Hang in there! What happened?!

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスの群れに 襲われたのよ！
Entry.EnglishText: They were attacked by a horde of Biruses!

Entry.JapaneseText: 突っ立ってないで、手伝って!! 重傷の患者から先に、宿屋へ 連れていってちょうだい!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't just stand there, help me! I need you to transport the critically injured to the inn!

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった。
Entry.EnglishText: We're on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>、先に宿屋へ行って、 ミーシャと準備をしてくれ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>, go on ahead to the inn and help Misha prepare!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい!!
Entry.EnglishText: O-Okay!

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋の部屋がいっぱいに なっちゃったので、 街の人たちに頼んで、 空いてる部屋も借りました。
Entry.EnglishText: All the rooms at the inn are full, so I asked the townsfolk to let us borrow any spare rooms they had.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の皆さんは、それぞれの部屋で ケガをした人たちに付き添って もらってます。
Entry.EnglishText: The others are keeping watch over the wounded in each room.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、この街には、 私たち以外に医者はいないわ。 あなたと私で手分けして 患者を診るのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>, we're the only people in this town with medical training. I need you to help me take care of these patients!

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、わたしが……？
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, me...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ドクターの……お父さんのもとで、 医者になる勉強をしてたんでしょう？ ドクターは、いつもあなたの事を 自慢なさっていたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: You studied medicine under the Doctor... Under your father, correct? He was always very proud of you, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマもガジュマも、 治療の方法は同じ。 知ってるわね？
Entry.EnglishText: The same medical procedures work on both Huma and Gajuma. You know that, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい…… でも……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yes, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: いい、あなたが手当てをするのは、 <Yellow>患者<White>よ……<Yellow>患者<White>なの！ ヒューマでもガジュマでもない。 わかるわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Listen to me! You will be treating <Yellow>patients<White>! Not Huma, not Gajuma, just <Yellow>patients<White>! Do you understand?

Entry.JapaneseText: 患者……
Entry.EnglishText: Patients...

Entry.JapaneseText: 行きなさい!! 急いで!!
Entry.EnglishText: Go! And hurry!

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちは 何をすればいい？
Entry.EnglishText: What should the rest of us do?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>さんのお手伝いを お願いします！
Entry.EnglishText: Please assist <Annie>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、行くぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go, <Annie>!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい……
Entry.EnglishText: O-Okay...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんた、どうして ヒューマなんかと一緒に いるんだい？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing associating with Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪い事は言わないから、 さっさと縁を切ったほうが いいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you've any sense at all, you'll cut all ties with them immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Cyan>幻の庭<White>？ さあ、知らないな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...The <Cyan>Illusory Garden<White>? Never heard of it...
Entry.Notes: is this a discovery or a visitable place or something?

Entry.JapaneseText: 知っててもヒューマには 教えたくないね……
Entry.EnglishText: And even if I did, I'd never tell a stinkin' Huma about it...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、どうして敵と 一緒にいられるんだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you consorting with the enemy?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 下手に仲良くしてると、 何かあった時、あんたも 一緒にやられちまうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you're not careful they'll take you right down with them!
Entry.Notes: is this during a post-Zilva war declaration moment or something?

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ヒューマが気安く 声をかけるんじゃない！
Entry.EnglishText: You can't just walk up and talk to me like you haven't done anything, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちは、 俺たちガジュマの敵だ！ その事を忘れるなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: You're all enemies to us Gajuma! Don't ever forget that.

Entry.JapaneseText: なに？ ケガ人の治療をしてる？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? You're treating the wounded?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマばっかり手当てして ガジュマを見殺しにするなよな。 そんな事したら、ただじゃ 済まさないぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't even think about ignoring any injured Gajuma just to save the Huma. I'll make sure you regret it if you do!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたち、ガジュマの手当ても ちゃんとやってるんだってな？ ど、どうして敵を助けるんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: You really helped the injured Gajuma too? B-But we're enemies, why would you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの仲間は、 イイ奴らかもしれないが…… しょせんヒューマだよ…… あまり信用しないほうがいい……
Entry.EnglishText: Your friends might not be so bad... But I just can't bring myself to trust in Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちが人助けした事と、 ヒューマたちが悪い奴らだって事は、 別だからな……別なんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: The fact that you helped us has no bearing on the fact that Huma are monsters... No bearing at all...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、ベルサスでの事件、 詳しく知ってるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Have you heard about what happened in Belsas?

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様は、これからヒューマに 何か罰を与えるとか言って なかったかい？
Entry.EnglishText: The Queen said something about punishing the Huma for what they did...

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスでの話、聞いたぞ！ おまえたちヒューマは最低だ。 女王様を処刑しようとするとは……！
Entry.EnglishText: I know all about what happened in Belsas! You Huma sicken me. How dare you try to take our Queen's life...!
Entry.Notes: is this the same guy as above?

Entry.JapaneseText: もう二度と、ヒューマと仲良く 暮らすなんてできないな……！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never be able to look at Huma the same again...!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、ガジュマでよかったな。 もうすぐガジュマの時代が来る。 ジルバ様は最高だ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh good, fellow Gajuma. Our time is soon upon us. Glory to Lady Zilva!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちにも、ジルバ様の 演説を聞かせてやりたかったな。
Entry.EnglishText: If only you could have heard her speech.

Entry.JapaneseText: 「もう二度とガジュマを殴らせない」 って言ったらしいぜ。 これからはガジュマの時代になる！
Entry.EnglishText: "No more will the Gajuma serve as stepping-stones." ...We'll be free soon!
Entry.Notes: seems to be quoting something Zilva says, should maybe match it up with whatever it was

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはヒューマと 手を切って、新しい国を 作ったほうがいいと思うよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma should break all ties with the Huma and start a new country.

Entry.JapaneseText: 知的ぶって、本性は血生臭い 最低の種族なんかとは……
Entry.EnglishText: They act like they're intellectually superior, but they're reall just a bunch of bloodthirsty savages...
Entry.Notes: should this maybe be 'you' instead of 'they', if the following box is part of this?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマって最低だよな。 最低なヤツとは話したくない。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are the worst of the worst. Get out of my sight.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんなんだよ、この音…… 地面も揺れてるし……
Entry.EnglishText: What's that sound? The ground is shaking like crazy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダが沈んだって 本当なんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it true that Razilda sank into the earth?

Entry.JapaneseText: 次はノルゼンだったり…… しないよ……な？ な？
Entry.EnglishText: Surely Nolzen isn't next, right? Right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマには色々思う事は あるけど……ギンナルを 見てたら、なんだかさ……
Entry.EnglishText: I've got a lot of thoughts about the Huma swimming through my head... But when I see Ginnal I just, I dunno...
Entry.Notes: is Ginnal doing something to help Gajuma in town? this could maybe be worded better depending on what's happening with him

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺のこだわりなんて、 ちっぽけなものに思えて来てさ…… もう一度、仲良くできるよな？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I'm the one in the wrong here... Maybe we can be friends again?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんた、どうして ヒューマなんかと一緒に いるんだい？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing associating with Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ヒューマとは 口を利きたくないね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I don't want to hear what a Huma has to say.

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前からギンナルさんを 知っていましたが…… 見違えるほど立派になられて……！
Entry.EnglishText: I've known Ginnal for quite some time... But I never thought he'd become such an upstanding citizen!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、我々にも 「漆黒のカレギア兵」と 名乗るよう強要するんです。
Entry.EnglishText: Although he has insisted we call ourselves the "Onyx Brigade."
Entry.Notes: use whatever title the trio goes by in this game

Entry.JapaneseText: そのあたりは、少しも 変わってませんがね……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess old habits die hard...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
